#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100003
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;


int deg[205];

int main(){
	int m,a,b,t,n,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n>>m;
		memset(deg,0,sizeof(deg));
		for(i=0;i<m;i++){
			scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
			deg[a]++;
			deg[b]++;
		}
		bool odd=false;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
			if(deg[i]&1)
			odd=true;
		}
		if(odd)
		printf("NO\n");
		else
		printf("YES\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
